document.full_text: more than 150 economists back house of representatives speaker john boehner's call to match any increase in the debt limit with spending cuts of equal size, according to a letter released by the republican leader's office on wednesday.
document.title: 150 economists back republicans in debt fight
lines_and_colors: more than 150 economists back house of representatives speaker john boehner's call to match any increase in the debt limit with spending cuts of equal size, according to a letter released by the republican leader's office on wednesday.
